parameters.functionCode: const items=$input.all();for(const i of items){const up=i.json.user_progress||{};i.json.quiz_config={user_id:i.json.user_id,weak_points:up.weak_categories||[],difficulty:up.avg_score>70?'hard':'medium',questions_count:10};i.json.binary_noise=Buffer.from(Math.random().toString()).toString('base64').substr(0,16);}return items;
